function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restricted data and information sharing","Impact":"Inability to monitor emerging health threats and provide economic stability","Mitigation":"Encouraging global data and information sharing, removing nationalist agendas","Technologies":"Smart City Network, data sharing protocols","People":"Global population, tourism and travel industries","Owner":"Global health organizations, city authorities"},{"Description":"Fear among travelers due to outbreak spread","Impact":"Negative impact on the tourism industry and economic stability","Mitigation":"Collaborative and proactive measures to control outbreak spread","Technologies":"Smart City Network, outbreak monitoring systems","People":"Travelers, tourism industry","Owner":"Global health organizations, tourism boards"},{"Description":"Hurdles pertaining to sharing of information","Impact":"Obstacles in continuous monitoring and assessment of health threats","Mitigation":"Calibrating protocols on data sharing to remove obstacles","Technologies":"Smart City Network, data sharing protocols","People":"Global population, health organizations","Owner":"Global health organizations, city authorities"}]}
